column4: Hey I have a dual boot windows 7 -- ubuntu Lucid,  no I want to run windows7 from within ubuntu like virtualbox or something,  how should I do this?
Install VBox, then reinstall Windows inside of it
I don't want to reinstall it though, I need the already installed programs in windows and don't want to reinstall them all
True, that's why I keep a large "storage" partition in NTFS to access from both sides
